title: Stories from the Turkish community : Digital Storytelling project
creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, Mustafa Yucel, Umit Ugur, Bayram Ocal, Yusuf Hazar, Figen Hasimoglu, Memet Gunes, Riza Guclu, Huseyin Duman, Fatma Coskun, Kenan Besiroglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Eleven Turkish migrants, from Cyprus and Turkey, tell of their experiences migrating and making Australia their new home. They tell of the reasons for moving here, the journey to Australia and share their feelings for their family, their community and their adopted country.
